list_definition.definition: a bracelet worn on the arm or leg

list_ex_of_english: After a lot of bargaining, the customers and the salesperson finally agree on a price of fifteen dollars for five bangles.
So if a lady has five gold coins on a bangle and does not declare them, will she be committing an offence.
Married women put a vermillion mark and wear an iron bangle as marriage symbols.
These women also wear bangles in their traditional way.
Many are also vendors of goods such as bangles, buttons, cosmetics and undergarments.
Over time, clay bangles were discarded for more durable ones.
Interestingly, some items - finger rings, solid bangles and chains - were made only in copper and iron even after the advent of gold working.
